site_name: Development Site At Ergon House Horseferry Road And
description: Amendments to planning permission dated 29 July 2017 (RN: 13/09737/FULL) for Demolition of Ergon House and construction of eight storey residential building incorporating a ground floor retail unit (Class A1) and partial demolition and reconstruction of rear wing of 9 Millbank and conversion to residential use to provide 161 residential flats. Conversion of the gatehouse on Dean Bradley Street to provide a single dwelling unit. Provision of basement car parking and landscaped courtyard. NAMELY, internal revisions to east side of 7th floor, dumb waiter amended to a passenger lift on 8th, 9th and 10th floor with the smoke shaft wall adjusted southwards, height of parapet wall on 9th and 10th floors raised by 300mm, ladder position amended on 10th floor and roof, installation of steps and glass balustrade to proposed lift at roof level and addition of condition 37 to read: 'The roof terrace passenger lift must be installed and operated in accordance with the specification set out in the letter from Premier (Reference 9 Millbank-Q15121-1-Penthouse lift rooftop operation). For the avoidance of doubt the lift is to be pre-programmed to automatically return to level 8 after arrival at the roof terrace level after a period of 5 minutes. If the lift is replaced it must be replaced by a lift with the same specification and operating procedure.'
